body:
Dear all.
I just wanted to announce the availability of a new release of a set of  
scripts for the 3D content creation suite Blender - called LiVi - that  
acts as a pre/post-processor for Radiance. Version 2 includes animatable  
materials and geometry, dynamic daylight simulation capability and  
artificial lights via IES files.
Details and download at  
http://arts.brighton.ac.uk/research/office-for-spatial-research/projects2/livi
Version 0.2 should be fairly 'stable' but bug reports, questions and  
feature requests are most welcome. I can be contacted directly at  
R.Southall_at_brighton_dot_ac_dot_uk.
Regards
Ryan




Dr Ryan Southall
School of Art, Design & Media,
University of Brighton
